text: haey knongchamnaom phosdo tang teanglay( del banhcheak pi anoupheap) robsa trong noh ku peloyb ning pelothngai preahatity ning preah chnt . chaur puok anak kom saou chout champoh preahatity ning preah chnt aoy saoh te puok anak trauv saou chout champoh a l laoh del chea anak bangkeut puokvea vinh brasenbae puok anakchea anak del korp sakkar champoh trong temuoy men noh
